title: Course options & pricing
subtitle: Choose between fully personalised 1-to-1 coaching or a high-value structured group programme that builds a rock-solid foundation for IBDP exams.

private.label: Premium 1-to-1
private.title: Private online coaching
private.description: For students who want maximum customisation, tight accountability, and fast score improvements.
points: Deep dive into school tests, IA preparation, and mock exams.
Fully personalised by-topic drills and homework, adjusted weekly.
Weekly performance tracking with targeted correction of weak topics.
Ideal if you’re pushing for Level 6–7 / A* and want strict pacing.

intensive.label: 8-lesson intensive
points: Unlimited tailor-made past-paper practice with step-by-step solutions.
8 online lessons of 60 minutes with custom time allocation.
Detailed summary by topic and school mock exam prediction.
IBDP Math IA topic setup & guidance until completion.
Expected 2 grades improvement or better (e.g. from 5 to 7 in IBDP or from B to A* in A-Level) with full commitment.
Referral rebate of up to HKD 3,000 per student referred.

private.buttonNote: Mention “1-to-1 8-lesson package” and your current grade / target score.

group.label: High-value group
group.title: 32-lesson Zoom group course
group.description: Structured syllabus for IBMYP / IGCSE students bridging into IBDP AASL / AISL, with full notes and exam-style practice.
points: Approx. 32 live Zoom lessons + high-quality teaching videos.
By-topic notes, GoodNotes materials, and curated past-paper sets.
Designed so motivated students can rely on group only and still reach strong exam results.
